## EuStockMarket
```{r}
library(plotly)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
data("EuStockMarkets")
stocks <- as.data.frame(EuStockMarkets) %>%
  gather(index, price) %>%
  mutate(time = rep(time(EuStockMarkets), 4))

stocks %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=time, y=price, color=index)) +
  geom_line()
````
